events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position submitted by the candidate on May 10th. The resume highlights extensive experience in backend development.
The candidate's application has been categorised under Engineering based on skills in software development, specifically with Java and cloud infrastructure experience.
A recruiter specializing in Engineering roles has been assigned to the candidate to coordinate further communication and technical assessments.
Initial screening call with the candidate was successful, discussing their experience with microservices architecture and cloud deployment strategies.
The candidate responded promptly to the screening feedback, expressing strong interest in the role and availability for a technical interview next week.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 16th, with a focus on coding challenges and system design discussion relevant to the software engineer position.
